item.title: Session 06
item.description: Reference Sample Report To write an appropirate report, we are suggesting to use the Sample Report file. Each team should submit their report in “PDF” or “Word Document”. How Your Report Score Is Calculated? Your final score for a report is the sum of the scores for all of the report parts: Report Score Session 06 Presentation This is the Power Point of the sixth session.
